name: Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
chief_complaint: My nose won't stop running and I can't stop sneezing
prognosis: Excellent with proper management; symptoms typically resolve when allergen exposure ends
description: An IgE-mediated inflammatory response of the nasal mucosa to airborne allergens like pollen, characterized by sneezing, rhinorrhea, and nasal congestion
risk_factors: outdoor exposure during high pollen counts
